name: Balboa Park
description: Seven Tepees' mission is work with urban youth entrusted to our care to foster the skills they need to make lifelong positive choices and to create their own opportunities for success.
fullDescription: Seven Tepees' mission is work with urban youth entrusted to our care to foster the skills they need to make lifelong positive choices and to create their own opportunities for success.
whatTheyOffer: Balboa Park is part of The San Francisco Recreation and Park Department. Location Features: - Accessible Children's Play Area - Accessible Parking - Accessible Picnic Area - Accessible Restroom - Athletic Field - Baseball Diamond - Dog Play Area - Outdoor Basketball Court - Picnic Area - Playground - Restrooms - Skate Park - Stadium - Swimming Pool - Tennis Hours: Park Hours: 5 a.m. to Midnight Restroom Hours: Spring/Summer 8 a.m.- 8 p.m.; Fall/Winter 8 a.m.-5:30 p.m.
